title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

But it's fun none the less facing such crazy bots. I really hope they bring it back I like U.R.F. and all but they need to bring back doom bots and their fun crazy game modes.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

And later said they expected game modes to come back once every 1.5 months. Including URF. So yeah, people asking makes sense.
Hexkill in a 3 week rotation that must be the special one.
Hexakill is the biggest waste of a game mode i have seen in my entire life.
Yeah, I think it's safe to say most people aren't sure what Riot's thinking with that one.
Pretty sure the 1.5 Month was actually how long they said each mode was supposed to last, then they changed it to 3 days per mode, so that it would rotate each weekend.

No, no it wasn't. I'm far too lazy to find the post, but in one of their topics about discussion of the "upcoming" (at the time) queue each mode was expected to return every 1.5 months. It was said to be every weekend from the beginning, never 1.5 days.
I clearly said 1.5 Months.  So the modes were meant to last that long, but they changed it to 3 days each changing each weekend. Might want to learn to read.

Says the one who isn't reading what 'I' said. RETURNING every 1.5 months. Not LASTING 1.5 months each. They've said FROM THE BEGINNING gamemodes would last the weekends, they NEVER changed it from 1.5 months to the weekend.

They have, however; clearly stated that they expect each gamemode to RETURN every 1.5 months.

Clearly still didn't read what was said. He said that the game modes would be on the Weekends but that each of the modes would last over a 1.5 months being the next time you'd see a different mode would be 1.5 months after the previous one, but they would still be on the weekends.

No, that's not what he was saying at all. He clearly said "So the modes were meant to last that long, but they changed it to 3 days each changing each weekend." Meaning he, HIMSELF; said that they 'were' going to last a full 1.5 months, but later changed it to only lasting 3 days.

He didn't say that they'd be on the weekends AND last 1.5 months, he said originally they were GOING to last 1.5 months, and they later CHANGED that to 3 days. Which is simply not the case.

And heck, for the sake of argument let's pretend he 'did' mean that (Which the way all of his collective posts are written, he's clearly not saying that), it would still be wrong. And it would still be ignoring what I said.

And because I'm tired of blatantly wrong people ignoring what I'm saying:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/JzQkg9BJ-rotating-game-mode-queue-update
How often will we see modes repeat?
This will depend on how many modes fall into the stable rotation. Modes will likely repeat every 1.5~2 months. Again, once we get started and see what modes come and go from the rotation, this could shift a little bit.

So let's say this one last time, as clearly as possible. They said, AFTER stating that URF would show up "at least twice" that modes were expected to show up every 1.5~2 months.  There's no argument to be had there. They said that. Period.

No.  It's quite easy to understand what was said but you obviously just don't get it.  Say the game mode was Ascension, it would last for a month and a half, only available on weekends, and then when the 1.5 was over it would then change to URF, ect. However, Riot changed that idea to have each game mode rotate every weekend instead of having them all last for 1.5 months on weekends.

That is just blatantly untrue. They never once said that each mode would last 1.5 months. They said they would REPEAT every 1.5 months. Which is why how often you'd see them (1.5~2 months) depended on how many modes there were.

They stated on the announcement that it would be weekends. This has never changed. They stated after that announcement that it'd 'repeat' every 1.5 months.

Seriously, provide literally ANY evidence to support your claims. I've already provided you with the red post that says exactly what I'm saying. The announcement for the rotating queue clearly states the other half of what I'm saying. What you're saying, was simply never true.
More time yay, our prayers have been heard.
no no. we still get more hexkill then urf, no prayer has been answered.
Like for Real Why is Hexakill in the rotation like 3 times a rotation URF is what pretty much everyone looks forward too.

Like the red jungles burn you overtime or like there's a wildfire in them every 3 mins that does tons of dmg, and in the river like you said there could be a really big slow and maybe periodic nami ults, and in blue jg there could be some sort of heavy mist that makes you blind or that makes you see things like hallucinations of champions. And maybe there would be like certain events when the epic monsters spawn like the dragon scorches the map as he flies in, void scuttle has like a nocturne ult but voidy, and baron summons like a bunch of the things from a void gate around the map or something. Just an idea

One for all seems pointless unless both teams are the same champion.  I also feel like Summoners Rift is the worst map for "fun" game modes. I have played 7 games of one for all and they all have lasted over an hour. nothing fun about an hour long game with stale fights because everyone on the enemy team is the same champ. This would all be fixed on howling abyss because that map is fun regardless of anything. it is small, lots of fighting, games are over in less than 30 min almost every time. There is a reason you moved hex to trusted treeline from summoners rift. SR is too big and needs something to speed the game up for it to be fun, and urf is the only thing that does that.
Personally, I don't even play Hexakill. Why is it on so much? I rather play urf.
Would be cool if instead a set Rotation the community were to vote on the next weeks feature game mode where no mode could be selected more than two weeks in a row just food for thought.
